oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Photograph of billboard supporting Metropolitan Government, ca. 1968
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A photograph of a billboard supporting Metropolitan Government, circa 1968. The sign stood at the corner of Thompson Lane and Nolensville Road and read: "Metro...growing today to meet tomorrow's needs." b & w; 8 x 10 in.
